name: Hardlight Katana
description:
In progress alpha prototype for a senior project game.

WASD to move mouse to aim and shoot

Escape to pause and see options

-OR-

Controller w/ left joystick to move, right joystick to aim and right trigger to shoot

Start to pause and see options

(Tested only with Xbox 360 and Xbone controllers)

-OR-

Wiimotes are supported! You have to connect via Bluetooth to the PC (I recommend using the Dolphin Emulator also, it will help get the wiimote connected) and then use an Infrared solution of your choice (usb sensor bar, candlelight, whatever).
